detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#21-24) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#22)

BasicToken.canTransfer(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#116-122) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-locked (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#117)

StandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#173-252) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#81)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#149-151)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#83)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#132-142)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#82)
detectors.markdown:
[StandardToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L173-L252) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- [ERC20Basic.totalSupply](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L81)
	- [BasicToken.balanceOf(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L149-L151)
	- [ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L83)
	- [BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L132-L142)
	- [ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L82)

detectors.description:
SafeMath.div(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#14-19) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- c = a / b (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#16)

[SafeMath.div(uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#L14-L19) may have integer overflow

detectors.description: Parameter BasicToken.setLocked(bool)._locked (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#112) is not in mixedCase
Parameter BasicToken.canTransfer(address)._addr (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#116) is not in mixedCase
Parameter BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256)._to (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#132) is not in mixedCase
Parameter BasicToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#149) is not in mixedCase
Parameter BurnableToken.burn(uint256)._value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#267) is not in mixedCase
Constant AIRToken.initialSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#287) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

AIRToken.smartanalysisConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#281-299) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 4000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#287)

detectors.description:

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#149-151)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#132-142)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#83)

lockAddress(address,bool) should be declared external:

setLocked(bool) should be declared external:

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AIRToken__1.sol#222-224)
